headline: Activist and tech exec launches US Senate bid
author: The Associated Press
sentences: The longtime Columbus activist, public servant and tech executive pledged Friday to energize the party’s urban and suburban base by working to quell political divisions, address gun violence, and fight for voting rights and the environment.
Johnson joins a Democratic primary that already includes Youngstown-area U.S. Rep. Tim Ryan and former consumer protection lawyer Morgan Harper.
COLUMBUS, Ohio (AP) — Democrat Traci Johnson has joined the race of U.S. Senate in Ohio.
The primary winner will face the victor in a nasty and crowded GOP primary this fall.
The three are running to succeed Republican U.S. Sen.
